prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing get-well greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "A get well soon card from the me that got through this horrible job and boy crap to the me that is struggling right now. "
Style: ‚ú® Smart Style
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Rana
From: Rana
Message: "Hey Rana, I know things are really tough right now, but please remember the strength that got you through everything before. You've navigated heartache and overcome immense challenges, and you have that same incredible resilience within you now. Hold on tight, because I know for a fact that you will get through this, too.

All my love,
Rana"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "get-well" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a soft, luminous watercolor style depicting a Kintsugi-inspired scene. The illustration shows two hands‚Äîdelicate and expressive‚Äîgently cradling a ceramic bowl that has been broken and beautifully repaired with shimmering gold lacquer, its golden cracks glowing warmly. The background is a wash of gentle, blended colors like dusty rose, soft lavender, and a hopeful, pale yellow, suggesting a sunrise. The watercolor technique is loose and flowing, with soft edges and a wet-on-wet application that feels both ethereal and deeply emotional. The focus is on the radiant light emanating from the mended cracks, symbolizing the beauty and strength found in healing and overcoming past struggles. It‚Äôs a tender, artistic, and profoundly personal image that speaks directly to resilience and self-love.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a get-well card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a soft, luminous watercolor style depicting a Kintsugi-inspired scene. The illustration shows two hands‚Äîdelicate and expressive‚Äîgently cradling a ceramic bowl that has been broken and beautifully repaired with shimmering gold lacquer, its golden cracks glowing warmly. The background is a wash of gentle, blended colors like dusty rose, soft lavender, and a hopeful, pale yellow, suggesting a sunrise. The watercolor technique is loose and flowing, with soft edges and a wet-on-wet application that feels both ethereal and deeply emotional. The focus is on the radiant light emanating from the mended cracks, symbolizing the beauty and strength found in healing and overcoming past struggles. It‚Äôs a tender, artistic, and profoundly personal image that speaks directly to resilience and self-love.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Hey Rana, I know things are really tough right now, but please remember the strength that got you through everything before. You've navigated heartache and overcome immense challenges, and you have that same incredible resilience within you now. Hold on tight, because I know for a fact that you will get through this, too.

All my love,
Rana" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a soft, luminous watercolor style depicting a Kintsugi-inspired scene. The illustration shows two hands‚Äîdelicate and expressive‚Äîgently cradling a ceramic bowl that has been broken and beautifully repaired with shimmering gold lacquer, its golden cracks glowing warmly. The background is a wash of gentle, blended colors like dusty rose, soft lavender, and a hopeful, pale yellow, suggesting a sunrise. The watercolor technique is loose and flowing, with soft edges and a wet-on-wet application that feels both ethereal and deeply emotional. The focus is on the radiant light emanating from the mended cracks, symbolizing the beauty and strength found in healing and overcoming past struggles. It‚Äôs a tender, artistic, and profoundly personal image that speaks directly to resilience and self-love.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a soft, luminous watercolor style depicting a Kintsugi-inspired scene. The illustration shows two hands‚Äîdelicate and expressive‚Äîgently cradling a ceramic bowl that has been broken and beautifully repaired with shimmering gold lacquer, its golden cracks glowing warmly. The background is a wash of gentle, blended colors like dusty rose, soft lavender, and a hopeful, pale yellow, suggesting a sunrise. The watercolor technique is loose and flowing, with soft edges and a wet-on-wet application that feels both ethereal and deeply emotional. The focus is on the radiant light emanating from the mended cracks, symbolizing the beauty and strength found in healing and overcoming past struggles. It‚Äôs a tender, artistic, and profoundly personal image that speaks directly to resilience and self-love.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover: "Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, rendered in a textured, painterly digital art style with visible brushstrokes. The scene depicts a solitary, dark, stylized human figure looking upwards with hope. Above the figure, a warm, glowing golden hand extends downwards, holding a radiant droplet of light that illuminates the scene. The ground is covered in a dense, dark field of menacing thorns, symbolizing struggle or pain. The background features stormy, textured, dark purple clouds. The text "Thinking of you, Rana" is prominently displayed in the lower portion of the image, written in an elegant, flowing golden cursive script. The overall mood is somber yet hopeful, with a strong emphasis on light overcoming darkness and a sense of comfort being offered. The color palette is dominated by deep purples, dark blues, and contrasting warm golden yellows, creating a dramatic and emotional atmosphere. The composition places the figure and the light source as the central focus, with the thorns creating a challenging environment."
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a get-well card with a soft, luminous watercolor style. The background is a deep, textured navy blue, reminiscent of a night sky. In the lower left quadrant, a stylized, glowing yellow seedling emerges from a warm golden seed. The seedling has a graceful, curved stem with two delicate, glowing yellow leaves and a central spiral flourish at the top. Several small, twinkling white stars are scattered across the upper portion of the background, providing a subtle and hopeful celestial element. The overall composition is minimalist and serene, hinting at the potential for growth and resilience, and subtly referencing the theme of light emerging from darkness. There is ample negative space on the right side of the card, suitable for a QR code in the bottom right corner.

  "frontCover": "A surreal, dreamlike 2D flat illustration with a 9:16 ratio, depicting a dark, thorny maze stretching across the landscape, representing past struggles.   "leftInterior": "Left interior page of a get-well card with a 9:16 ratio. It gracefully arcs across the frame, adorned with numerous golden leaves and delicate, small golden flowers. The light source remains the intense, radiant golden glow emanating from the base of the vine, which casts a warm, ethereal light upwards towards the starry, cloud-streaked sky. The sky itself transitions from the deep, dark blue with stars on the right to softer, illuminated clouds on the left, suggesting the passage from night to day. The artistic style is a sophisticated blend of painterly texture and magical realism, with a focus on the luminous quality of the golden elements against the darker, more subdued background. The overall mood is hopeful and empowering, illustrating the journey of healing and emerging strength. The composition is dynamic, with the vine acting as a powerful visual anchor. The overall artistic style remains consistent with painterly fantasy and magical realism, emphasizing soft textures and atmospheric light. The composition artfully integrates the heartfelt message within the uplifting visual metaphor, creating an emotional peak for the card. The tone is deeply sincere and emotionally resonant."
}

generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with elegantly handwritten text. The background is a deep, starry night sky with hints of dark, silhouetted trees on the left and right edges, fading into a soft, blurred deep blue and indigo gradient. In the lower left and right quadrants, there are delicate, stylized illustrations of luminous, glowing yellow flowers and foliage. These floral elements have a painterly, slightly abstract quality with soft edges and a scattering of subtle golden sparkles that create a magical, ethereal atmosphere. The overall artistic style is reminiscent of a soft, luminous watercolor or gouache painting with a slightly muted but rich color palette. The text, "Hey Rana, I know things are really tough right now, but please remember the strength that got you through everything before. You've navigated heartache and overcome immense challenges, and you have that same incredible resilience within you now. Hold on tight, because I know for a fact that you will get through this, too. All my love, Rana" is prominently displayed in the center of the page, written in a beautiful, flowing, golden cursive script. The script is highly legible, with a natural, warm character and slight variations in line weight that suggest genuine handwriting rather than perfect digital font. The color of the text is a bright, radiant gold that stands out against the dark background, with a subtle glow around it. The composition skillfully balances the expressive, heartfelt message with the serene, atmospheric background, creating an emotional and visually appealing space for the recipient to read and feel the sentiment. The design avoids any borders or frames, allowing the text and background artwork to blend seamlessly, creating a full-bleed, immersive experience.
